General.Name: Hangzhou Huawang New Material Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Hangzhou Huawang New Material Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of decorative base papers. It also engages in the wood pulp trade and thermal energy businesses. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Huatian Paper Co. Ltd. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
